trans-unit.source: Azure Backup in 10mins | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup in 10mins | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get started with Azure Backup in 10mins
trans-unit.target: Get started with Azure Backup in 10mins

trans-unit.source: Try Azure Backup in 10mins
trans-unit.target: Try Azure Backup in 10mins

trans-unit.source: It is extremely easy to setup Azure Backup and the following how-to videos will help you get started.
trans-unit.target: It is extremely easy to setup Azure Backup and the following how-to videos will help you get started.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Get an Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Get an Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure subscription, you can get started with a free trial offer which lets you access any Azure service.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure subscription, you can get started with a free trial offer which lets you access any Azure service.

trans-unit.source: Visit the following link <link><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more.
trans-unit.target: Visit the following link <link><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more.

trans-unit.source: You can skip this step you have an Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can skip this step you have an Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Configure the Azure Backup service
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Configure the Azure Backup service

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 1 of 3 - Set up a backup vault on Azure</linkText><title></title></link> to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 1 of 3 - Set up a backup vault on Azure</linkText><title></title></link> to:

trans-unit.source: Create a backup vault
trans-unit.target: Create a backup vault

trans-unit.source: Download the "vault credentials"
trans-unit.target: Download the "vault credentials"

trans-unit.source: Download the Azure Backup agent
trans-unit.target: Download the Azure Backup agent

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Prepare your on-premises machine
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Prepare your on-premises machine

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 2 of 3 - Prepare your production server for Azure Backup</linkText><title></title></link> to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 2 of 3 - Prepare your production server for Azure Backup</linkText><title></title></link> to:

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure Backup agent on your Windows Server/client or DPM server.
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure Backup agent on your Windows Server/client or DPM server.

trans-unit.source: Register the machine against the backup vault
trans-unit.target: Register the machine against the backup vault

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Backup and restore data
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Backup and restore data

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 3 of 3 - Start backing up your production server</linkText><title></title></link> to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video <link><linkText>Getting Started with Azure Backup 3 of 3 - Start backing up your production server</linkText><title></title></link> to:

trans-unit.source: Backup data from a server
trans-unit.target: Backup data from a server

trans-unit.source: Restore backed up data from Azure
trans-unit.target: Restore backed up data from Azure

trans-unit.target: Next steps
